snippet.title: Snapshot PC Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
http://store.steampowered.com/app/204220/

It's finally here!  Snapshot has arrived on PC and it's available on Steam.

Snapshot is a 2d puzzle platformer about photos, robots, and adventure.  Join Pic on his journey across four different worlds spanning over 100 levels.  Available for just $9.99, with a launch sale of 10% off!  Nominated for an IGF Award, and an official selection of the Boston Indie Showcase, and the PAX10.  Check it out!

http://retroaffect.com
